characters.name: Baast
characters.description: The leader of the cats of ancient Anugypt in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #24. Her color scheme is based on Twilight Sparkle's. In concept art, she had wings, a single tail, and a forehead cutie mark of an ankh.

characters.name: Capper
characters.description: Capper is a male anthropomorphic cat who appears as a supporting character in My Little Pony The Movie. He also appears in the IDW comics and the season nine episodes Between Dark and Dawn and The Last Problem. He is a Klugetown con artist and former aristocrat from Abyssinia. He is called Capper Dapperpaws in some merchandise.

characters.name: Chummer
characters.description: Capper's best friend in My Little Pony: The Movie Prequel Issues #1-3. In the third issue, he betrays Capper and tries to abandon him in Klugetown. In the fourth issue, his paw prints appear on pages 2-3. In Gameloft's mobile game, "Chummer and Capper used to be friends". His in-game description states, "True to his name, he was once Capper's friend -- though their bond wasn't one that would last, in the end." Visually based on Andy Price's cat Bela Lugosi; see also Bela.

characters.name: King of Abyssinia
characters.description: The King of Abyssinia in My Little Pony: The Movie Prequel Issue #1. Also appears in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #61, Issue #75, and Issue #77. Resembles Andy Price's cat Gomez. He is a character called "Abyssinian King" in Gameloft's mobile game. His in-game description states, "The King of Abyssinia will willingly give up his crown to a would-be conqueror if it ensures the protection of his citizens. He has a much harder time surrendering cursed magical objects to them, though."

characters.name: Queen of Abyssinia
characters.description: The Queen of Abyssinia in My Little Pony: The Movie Prequel Issue #1. Also appears in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #61. Resembles Andy Price's cat Morticia. She is a character called "Abyssinian Queen" in Gameloft's mobile game. Her in-game description states, "This kitty has what it takes to run a country. For instance: money. And when the Storm King came looking to plunder her homeland, she kept her people's needs at heart."

characters.name: Scaredy Cat
characters.description: Capper's cousin. Mentioned by Capper in My Little Pony: Nightmare Knights Issue #2.

characters.name: Sweeps
characters.description: In The Official Movie Sourcebook.​[​specify​]​

characters.name: Whiskers
characters.description: In The Official Movie Sourcebook.​[​specify​]​

characters.name: Bela
characters.description: One of Andy Price's cats. Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #1 page 3/Dynamic Forces cover RE. Named after Bela Lugosi; see also Chummer.

characters.name: Boris
characters.description: One of Andy Price's cats. Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #1 page 3/Dynamic Forces cover RE. Named after Boris Karloff.

characters.name: Dottie
characters.description: Appears in Read It and Weep in Daring Do and the Quest for the Sapphire Stone. Also appears in Daring Don't. Appears as Goldie Delicious' pet in Pinkie Apple Pie and The Perfect Pear. Named in Going to Seed. Also appears in Daring Doubt.

characters.name: Fluffy
characters.description: Prince Rutherford's cat. Pictured—as from Pound Puppies—in My Little Pony Equestria Girls. Mentioned in a UK MLP magazine​[​specify​]​ comic​[​specify​]​/Egmont's Polish My Little Pony magazine issue 6/19 comic "Zamieszanie na szczycie". Named like Mr. Fluffy and F'wuffy.

characters.name: Grumpy Cat
characters.description: Grumpy Cat. Depicted by the cutie mark of "Sourpuss" in Rarity Takes Manehattan.

characters.name: Lemon Squeezy
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in MLPEG Friendship Games _Bloopers_, The Perfect Pear, Monday Blues, Road Trippin, Grannies Gone Wild, Going to Seed, and The Big Mac Question. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #2 and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #8. [1]​[​specify​]​

characters.name: Mina
characters.description: One of Andy Price's cats. Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #1 page 3/Dynamic Forces cover RE. Shares her name with a dragon. Named after Mina Harker.

characters.name: Miss Kitty
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in The Perfect Pear, Overpowered, Road Trippin, Driving Miss Shimmer, (Choose Fluttershy), and Going to Seed. Shares her design and eye color with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #3, S04E09 Unnamed Cat #10, and S07E13 Unnamed Cat #1. Miss Kitty;​[​specify​]​ see also Cherry Jubilee.

characters.name: Mr. Fluffy
characters.description: A pet cat that doesn't appear but is addressed by Goldie Delicious during Pinkie Apple Pie. Named like Fluffy and F'wuffy.

characters.name: Opalescence
characters.description: Opalescence, or Opal for short, is Rarity's pet cat. She is introduced in the episode Suited For Success.

characters.name: Pooples
characters.description: A pet cat that doesn't appear but is addressed by Goldie Delicious during Pinkie Apple Pie.

characters.name: Sam
characters.description: One of Andy Price's cats. Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #1 page 3/Dynamic Forces cover RE. Shares its name with one of Princess Celestia's royal guards and a Storm Creature. Named after Sam Hain.

characters.name: Sneezy
characters.description: One of Fluttershy's kittens. Mentioned in Fluttershy and the Fine Furry Friends Fair.

characters.name: Spooky
characters.description: One of Andy Price's cats. Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #1 page 3/Dynamic Forces cover RE. Named.

characters.name: Tabitha
characters.description: One of Andy Price's cats. Appears on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #1 page 3/Dynamic Forces cover RE. Named after Tabitha Stephens.

characters.name: Mal
characters.description: A cat in My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #73.

characters.name: Mr. McBitey-Pants
characters.description: A lion living in Fluttershy's backyard, seen when the Cutie Mark Crusaders are attempting to get their cutie marks in zoology. Also on My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic Issue #64 page 16.

characters.name: Twilight Sparkle
characters.description: Twilight Sparkle is the central main character of My Little Pony Friendship is Magic. She is a female unicorn pony who transforms into an Alicorn and becomes a princess in Magical Mystery Cure. She is also the daughter of Twilight Velvet and Night Light, the younger sister of Shining Armor, sister-in-law to Princess Cadance, and paternal aunt to Flurry Heart.

characters.name: S02E06 Unnamed Lion
characters.description: Appears in The Cutie Pox being tamed by Apple Bloom when she has a lion-taming cutie mark.

characters.name: S02E07 Unnamed Kitten
characters.description: Appears in May the Best Pet Win! as one of the animals Fluttershy offers Rainbow Dash as a possible pet. Also appears in Read It and Weep, a poster, Magical Mystery Cure, My Little Pony Equestria Girls, Daring Don't, Filli Vanilli, Hamstocalypse Now, Enterplay collectible card game High Magic Critter, the Equestria Girls Minis Fluttershy Slumber Party Set, Epic Fails, "Tea Party-Animals", and Daring Doubt.

characters.name: S02E16 Unnamed Tiger
characters.description: Appears in Read It and Weep in Daring Do and the Quest for the Sapphire Stone. Also appears in Daring Don't and MLPEG Friendship Games _Bloopers_.

characters.name: S02E16 Unnamed Jaguar
characters.description: Appears in Read It and Weep in Daring Do and the Quest for the Sapphire Stone. Also appears in Daring Don't, and Daring Doubt.

characters.name: S02E16 Unnamed Lynx
characters.description: Appears in Read It and Weep in Daring Do and the Quest for the Sapphire Stone. Also appears in Daring Don't, and Daring Doubt.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #1
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in Filli Vanilli, The Perfect Pear, Overpowered, Road Trippin, Grannies Gone Wild, and Going to Seed. Part of C in "Which kitty makes you feel meow-velous!?" Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #6 and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #9.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #2
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in Filli Vanilli, The Perfect Pear, Overpowered, Road Trippin, and Going to Seed. Part of C in "Which kitty makes you feel meow-velous!?" Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #8 and Lemon Squeezy.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #3
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in Filli Vanilli, My Little Pony Equestria Girls: Friendship Games, MLPEG Friendship Games _Bloopers_, Every Little Thing She Does, The Perfect Pear, Road Trippin, Grannies Gone Wild, Going to Seed, and The Big Mac Question. B and part of C in "Which kitty makes you feel meow-velous!?" Shares its design and eye color with Miss Kitty, S04E09 Unnamed Cat #10, and S07E13 Unnamed Cat #1.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #4
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in Filli Vanilli, Music to My Ears, Every Little Thing She Does, The Perfect Pear, Overpowered, Road Trippin, Grannies Gone Wild, Going to Seed, and The Big Mac Question. Part of C in "Which kitty makes you feel meow-velous!?" Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #5 and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #7.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #5
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in MLPEG Friendship Games _Bloopers_, The Perfect Pear, Road Trippin, and Going to Seed. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #4 and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #7.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #6
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in Every Little Thing She Does, The Perfect Pear, Road Trippin, Grannies Gone Wild, and Going to Seed. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #1 and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #9.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #7
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in Music to My Ears, Every Little Thing She Does, The Perfect Pear, Road Trippin, and Going to Seed. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #4 and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #5.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #8
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in Every Little Thing She Does, The Perfect Pear, Overpowered, Road Trippin, Grannies Gone Wild, and Going to Seed. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #2 and Lemon Squeezy.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #9
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in MLPEG Friendship Games _Bloopers_, Every Little Thing She Does, The Perfect Pear, Grannies Gone Wild, and Going to Seed. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #1 and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #6.

characters.name: S04E09 Unnamed Cat #10
characters.description: Appears in Pinkie Apple Pie as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Also appears in The Perfect Pear, Grannies Gone Wild, Going to Seed, The Big Mac Question, and the Gameloft mobile game's Pet Shop. Shares its design and eye color with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #3, Miss Kitty, and S07E13 Unnamed Cat #1.

characters.name: S07E13 Unnamed Cat #1
characters.description: Appears in The Perfect Pear as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Shares its design and eye color with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #3, Miss Kitty, and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #10.

characters.name: S09E10 Unnamed Cat #1
characters.description: Appears in Going to Seed as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #1, S04E09 Unnamed Cat #6, and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #9.

characters.name: S09E10 Unnamed Cat #2
characters.description: Appears in Going to Seed as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #2, S04E09 Unnamed Cat #8, Lemon Squeezy, S09E10 Unnamed Cat #3, and S09E10 Unnamed Cat #4.

characters.name: S09E10 Unnamed Cat #3
characters.description: Appears in Going to Seed as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #2, S04E09 Unnamed Cat #8, Lemon Squeezy, S09E10 Unnamed Cat #2, and S09E10 Unnamed Cat #4.

characters.name: S09E10 Unnamed Cat #4
characters.description: Appears in Going to Seed as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #2, S04E09 Unnamed Cat #8, Lemon Squeezy, S09E10 Unnamed Cat #2, and S09E10 Unnamed Cat #3.

characters.name: S09E10 Unnamed Cat #5
characters.description: Appears in Going to Seed as one of Goldie Delicious' pet cats. Shares its design with S04E09 Unnamed Cat #4, S04E09 Unnamed Cat #5, and S04E09 Unnamed Cat #7.

characters.name: 21460 Unnamed Kitten
characters.description: File:Applejack's Sweet Apple Barn packaging.jpg.​[​specify​]​ Shares its design with 33277 Unnamed Kitty and A0585 Unnamed Cat.

characters.name: 33277 Unnamed Kitty
characters.description: ​[​specify​]​ Shares its design with 21460 Unnamed Kitten and A0585 Unnamed Cat.

characters.name: 33853 Unnamed Kitty

characters.description: File:Friendship Express Train Around Town Playset packaging.jpg; File:Friendship is Magic Twinkling Balloon Set with Rarity and Daisy Dreams.jpg, File:Friendship is Magic Twinkling Balloon Set back of packaging.jpg.​[​specify​]​ Shares its design with 21460 Unnamed Kitten and 33277 Unnamed Kitty.

characters.name: Issue 24 Unnamed Anugypt Cat #1
characters.description: One of the cats of ancient Anugypt in Friendship is Magic Issue #24. Her color scheme is similar to Fluttershy's.

characters.name: Issue 24 Unnamed Anugypt Cat #2
characters.description: One of the cats of ancient Anugypt in Friendship is Magic Issue #24. Her color scheme is similar to Applejack's.

characters.name: Issue 24 Unnamed Anugypt Cat #3
characters.description: One of the cats of ancient Anugypt in Friendship is Magic Issue #24. Her color scheme is based on Rainbow Dash's. In concept art, she had a forehead cutie mark of a rainbow.

characters.name: Issue 24 Unnamed Anugypt Cat #4
characters.description: One of the cats of ancient Anugypt in Friendship is Magic Issue #24. Her color scheme is similar to Pinkie Pie's.

characters.name: Issue 24 Unnamed Anugypt Cat #5
characters.description: One of the cats of ancient Anugypt in Friendship is Magic Issue #24 Her color scheme is similar to Derpy's.

characters.name: Issue 24 Unnamed Anugypt Cat #6
characters.description: One of the cats of ancient Anugypt in Friendship is Magic Issue #24. Her color scheme is similar to Rarity's.

characters.name: Unnamed Kitty
characters.description: D in "Which kitty makes you feel meow-velous!?"
